extendedInfo.description: BuildBITS is the easiest way to buy and sell New, Used, Second hand, Recycled, Excess stock and general unwanted Building Materials/ Products for FREE. This revolutionary Building materials website is completely FREE to join, sell and buy.BuildBITS APP is the most convenient and the fastest way to sell your materials/ products online right from where you are standing.Suitable for All Builders, Tradesman, Project managers, DIYerâs and everyone else that has unwanted materials/ products to get rid of and not pay to dispose of.Supported by many of Australia's leading building industry brands.Simply fill in your description, how much you want, take up to four images per item and submit instantly to the buildBITS website and your listing is live there and then.

reviews.title: Finally something easy to use!!
reviews.comment: Great idea and easy to use!!! Why pay all those fees to eBay and PayPal? It should be free and thanks for making this possible!!
reviews.author: Nick X

reviews.title: Good for builders
reviews.comment: Makes it really easy to upload listings.
reviews.author: A Google User
